decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal development would be interconnected with an existing garage building forming a single outbuilding. The combined outbuilding would be situated on land forward of a wall forming the principal elevation of the original dwellinghouse, contrary to Schedule 2, Part 1 Class E.1 (c) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - The proposal development would be interconnected with an existing garage building forming a single outbuilding. The combined outbuilding would have a maximum height greater than 2.5m within 2m of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, contrary to Schedule 2, Part 1 Class E.1 (e) (ii) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - The proposal development would be interconnected with an existing garage building forming a single outbuilding. The combined outbuilding would have an eaves height greater than 2.5m, contrary to Schedule 2, Part 1 Class E.1 (f) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 4 - The proposal is therefore NOT a lawful development.
description:
CERTIFICATE OF LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT (PROPOSED):
Enclosure of existing covered area at rear for use as studio
